custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) total FROM OEP_DATAMGT_DICTDATA WHERE 1=1 [$COMPANY_FILTER$] [$GROUP_FILTER$] [$COLLECTIONNAME_FILTER$] [$STATUS_FILTER$]

SELECT *, CONCAT_WS('',NODE_1,NODE_2,NODE_3,NODE_4,NODE_5) AS NODE_CODE FROM OEP_DATAMGT_DICTDATA WHERE 1=1 [$COMPANY_FILTER$] [$GROUP_FILTER$] [$COLLECTIONNAME_FILTER$] [$STATUS_FILTER$] ORDER BY NODE_CODE
